messages.subject: Re: Samurai Fiction Contest
messages.msgSnippet: You guys should check out the entries from previous years http://www.samurai-archives.com/guestart.html go to Fan Fiction near the bottom...I skimmed 2
messages.messageBody:
You guys should check out the entries from previous years
http://www.samurai-archives.com/guestart.html
go to "Fan Fiction" near the bottom...I skimmed 2 stories very
quickly and the stories seemed to presume that the readers have
atleast a background on the era to appreciate the story.... honestly
I know many writers from ff.net who could definately compete!

and right now the prize money is at $36...you can buy the director's
cut of RK Reflections (which now has the deleted scenes of S.H.)
(^_^)

messages.subject: Samurai Fiction Contest
messages.msgSnippet: I came across an announcement for this contest on the Ninja Dojo film board and thought I d pass it on. There s a small entry fee $6 I think BUT the Winner
messages.messageBody:
I came across an announcement for this contest on the Ninja Dojo film
board and thought I'd pass it on. There's a small entry fee $6 I think
BUT the "Winner" gets to keep all the fees collected as their prize!

I never win writing contests but I thought there may be braver souls
amongst all of you.
www.samurai-archives.com/writcon.html
<http://www.samurai-archives.com/writcon.html>

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
The Blog-- http://www.livejournal.com/users/b_sheridan/
